e="preserve">Gopichand Parmanand Hinduja (born 29 February 1940) is an Indian-born British billionaire businessman, the co-chairman of the Hinduja Group. As of May 2020, together with his brother Srichand he is the UK's second richest man.
Since the 1990s, he has been ranked many times as one of the UK and Asia's richest people. The "Forbes" List in March 2018 ranked him and his brother GP as the world's 55th richest billionaire family with a wealth of $19.5 billion.
In May 2019 The Hinduja brothers, Gopichand and Srichand, were once again named by the Time UK as the UK's wealthiest people, according to the annual Rich List survey.
